column5: Hey im just looking for some reviews or feedback anyone has for Excalibur Trailers. Im looking at getting one of there snowmobile trailers. They are located in Brampton.  thanks
I had one of their boat trailers for a couple of years. No issues with it.

no experience with their trailers but when my boat trailer was in needs of parts and repair they were great to deal with. Got everything I needed and prices were very good.  I've been looking at their ATV trailers and tryng to get some pricing.
Bought a utility/landscape trailer from them that rusted like crazy after one winter weekend trip on salted roads. Mechanically still okay, but looks derelict. Not sure I'd buy from them again.
Buy a Highland bigger tiers Mark is a great guy to deal with  Dan
I've got a double inline excalibur sled trailer and love it, zero problems what so ever. Hot dipped galvanized and no rust.
I have a single, and a double snowmobile trailer ( both bought used ) - had them both for a few years now - no issues what so ever - quite happy with both of them.   Don ( Tracker )

I bought a boat trailer from them in 2007 and sold it this spring with the boat but had no issues with the workmanship or the materials. It never saw salt or winter being a boat trailer and their price was a selling factor for sure.
